AC = N ^ M
	
ME[13] = -M	-4	1111111111111100
ME[14] = -N	-2	1111111111111110
ME[15] =  N	 2	0000000000000010

00: CLR X AC XX XX
01: MOV D R0 ME 13
02: MOV D R1 ME 14
03: ADD D AC ME 15
04: INC X R1 R1 XX
05: JMZ D XX XX 07
06: JMP D XX XX 03
07: INC X R0 R0 XX
08: JMZ D XX XX 10
09: JMP D XX XX 02


0000 00 001 000 0000
0100 00 010 000 1101
0100 00 011 000 1110
0101 00 001 000 1111
0001 00 011 011 0000
1001 00 000 000 0111
1011 00 000 000 0011
0001 00 010 010 0000
1001 00 000 000 1010
1011 00 000 000 0010
